conclusion: To determine the acceleration of the particle during the time interval from 1 to 3 seconds, we need to follow these steps:
At t = 1 second, the velocity v1 is 2 m/s.
At t = 3 seconds, the velocity v3 is -2 m/s.
Δv = v3 - v1 = -2 m/s - 2 m/s = -4 m/s
Δt = t3 - t1 = 3 s - 1 s = 2 s
a = Δv / Δt = -4 m/s / 2 s = -2 m/s²
